abstract: Digital Sky Technologies of Russia said it would pay $14.77 a share for Facebook common stock, lifting its stake to as much as 3.5 percent and valuing the online social network at about $6.5 billion.
snippet: Digital Sky Technologies of Russia said it would pay $14.77 a share for Facebook common stock, lifting its stake to as much as 3.5 percent and valuing the online social network at about $6.5 billion.
lead_paragraph: First it fell from $15 billion to $10 billion. Now, Facebook has gotten another valuation downgrade, this time to $6.5 billion.
